==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Tamara:''' Hello. Please see Doctor Zakariya if you need help.
:{{DIcon}} And you are...
::'''Tamara:''' I'm an intern, responsible only for patients' medical records.
::'''Tamara:''' Anything else is out of my jurisdiction.
::{{DIcon}} Are there many sick people?
::'''Tamara:''' Sorry, but per official orders, we cannot disclose patient information, including conditions and numbers.
::'''Tamara:''' Please forgive me.
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Tamara:''' See you.
{{Dialogue end}}
